message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DB, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.CY 

The paper deals with the issue of preventing "p-hacking" in scientific studies, which is a problem in the field of computer science and statistics. The use of cryptographic techniques and a tamper-proof ledger also suggests a focus on security and data management, which are common themes in the cs.CR and cs.DB sub-categories. The use of statistical tests and evaluation on real and synthetic datasets suggests a focus on machine learning and data analysis, which are common themes in the cs.LG and cs.DS sub-categories. Finally, the use of decentralized authority and auditing suggests a focus on blockchain and distributed systems, which are common themes in the cs.CY sub-category.
